Events.OnCreate:
(block (resistList total rnd choice) (setq resistList (typGetGlobalData &stLuminousAssembler; "Resist")) (setq total (item resistList 4))
; Depending on what we've been killed-by previously, create ; new drones that are resistant
(setq rnd (random 1 total)) (setq choice Nil) (for i 0 3 (if (and (not choice) (leq rnd (item resistList i))) (setq choice i) (setq rnd (subtract rnd (item resistList i))) ) )
; Add appropriate shield generator (switch (eq choice 0) (setq choice (itmCreate &itLuminousParticleShields; 1))
(eq choice 1) (setq choice (itmCreate &itLuminousBlastShields; 1))
(eq choice 2) (setq choice (itmCreate &itLuminousIonShields; 1))
(eq choice 3) (setq choice (itmCreate &itLuminousThermoShields; 1))
(setq choice Nil) )
; Install (if choice (block Nil (objAddItem gSource choice) (shpInstallDevice gSource choice) ) ) )
Events.OnDestroy:
(if aDestroyer (block (damage resistList d1 d2 d3 d4) ; Figure out what kind of damage killed us (setq damage (objGetDamageType aDestroyer))
; Increment the resist list (setq resistList (typGetGlobalData &stLuminousAssembler; "Resist")) (setq d1 (if (eq damage 2) (add (item resistList 0) 1) (item resistList 0))) (setq d2 (if (eq damage 3) (add (item resistList 1) 1) (item resistList 1))) (setq d3 (if (eq damage 4) (add (item resistList 2) 1) (item resistList 2))) (setq d4 (if (eq damage 5) (add (item resistList 3) 1) (item resistList 3)))
(typSetGlobalData &stLuminousAssembler; "Resist" (list d1 d2 d3 d4 (add (add (add d1 d2) d3) d4) ) ) ) )

ItemType.name: segment of Luminous armature
ItemType.description: The drones and hunter-killers of Luminous are protected with this armor. It is a conductive exotic alloy that defends them from ion weapons.

ItemType.name: Luminous 5care algorithm
ItemType.description: This cube contains algorithms used by Luminous to control its drones. When invoked on a quantum CPU, this causes drones to immediately leave the system.
ItemType.Invoke:
(switch ; If we don't have a quantum CPU (not (objGetItems gSource "*I+QuantumCPU")) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Quantum CPU required")
; Otherwise, we scare any Luminous drones (block (targets) (setq targets (sysFindObject gSource "sEN:20; B:luminousDrone;")) (enum targets target (block Nil (shpCancelOrders target) (shpOrderGate target) ) ) (if targets (objSendMessage gSource Nil "5care: Program complete") (objSendMessage gSource Nil "5care: No carrier signal") )
(itmSetKnown gItem) (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) ) )

ItemType.name: Luminous 7ame algorithm
ItemType.description: When invoked, this algorithm will reprogram a Luminous drone and imprint it with instructions to defend its programmer.
ItemType.Invoke:
(switch ; If we don't have a quantum CPU (not (objGetItems gSource "*I+QuantumCPU")) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "Quantum CPU required")
; Otherwise, we choose a random Luminous drone (block (target) (setq target (random (sysFindObject gSource "sEN:20; B:luminousDrone;")))
(if (not target) (objSendMessage gSource Nil "7ame: No carrier signal") (block Nil (objSetSovereign target &svFriendlyLuminous;) (shpSetController target "auton") (shpOrderEscort target gSource) (objSendMessage gSource target "7ame: Program complete") ) )
(itmSetKnown gItem) (objRemoveItem gSource gItem 1) ) )
